Description:
Managing the renewal process for Autodesk Services, Software, and Licenses in Kuwait
Providing training and support to both existing and new partners regarding Autodesk Services, Software, and Licenses, helping them to identify and close their renewal opportunities effectively.
Regularly sharing sales updates with the Services and Sales managers in the country.
Taking charge of Autodesk New subscription business in Kuwait
Overseeing the Channel partner pipeline, driving business growth, and ensuring successful closures.
Empowering partners to seek new business opportunities and keeping them informed about any ongoing promotions.
Proactively communicating with vendors to provide updates on deal status and business commitments.
Collaborating with local engineering bodies/associations to advocate for the endorsement of Autodesk solutions.Skills
Skills:
University degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or any related fields.
Between 2 to 6 years of experience in a software-related background.
2 to 6 years of experience in the IT industry within Kuwait.
Proficiency in computer skills, including a comprehensive understanding of the Microsoft Office suite.
Strong communication proficiency in both Arabic and English.
The ability to work effectively both autonomously and as an integral part of a team.
